>> f1
x^2 + y^2 + z^2 - 4
 
>> f2
cos(pi*y) - x
 
>> f3
y^2 - z
 
>> xnot
    -1     1     1

>> [Hist xfinal]=NewtonsMethodP5(f1,f2,f3,xnot,6)

Hist =

  -1.000000000000000   1.000000000000000   1.000000000000000
